content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DVSTDTC
      operator: date_less_than
      value: RFICDTC
Match Datasets:
  - Name: DM
    Keys:
      - USUBJID
Core:
  Id: CORE-000086
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.
Outcome:
  Message: DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.
  Output Variables:
    - DVSTDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0075
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The intent of the domain model is to capture protocol
                  deviations that occurred during the course of the study (see ICH
                  E3 Section 10.2 at http://www.ich.org/fileadmin/Public_Web_Site/ICH_Products/Guidelines/Efficacy/E3/E3_Guideline.pdf).
                  Usually these are deviations that occur after the subject has been
                  randomized or received the first treatment.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 1
                Section: 6.2.7
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DV

json.Description: Raise an error when DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.

Outcome.Message: DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The intent of the domain model is to capture protocol deviations that occurred during the course of the study (see ICH E3 Section 10.2 at http://www.ich.org/fileadmin/Public_Web_Site/ICH_Products/Guidelines/Efficacy/E3/E3_Guideline.pdf). Usually these are deviations that occur after the subject has been randomized or received the first treatment.
